base_description: Gray, rectangular cabinet with three drawers.
part_description: Contains three horizontal drawers, each with a handle, aligned vertically within a rectangular frame.
internal_interaction_description: Each drawer slides in and out of the main frame on rails, allowing access to the contents inside. The handles are attached to the front of each drawer, providing a means to pull them open or push them closed.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall or in a room, providing storage space. People can interact by opening drawers to store or retrieve items, and it can be moved or repositioned as needed.
